eosim::dist::NumberGeneratorFactory

eosim::dist::NumberGeneratorFactory Class Reference
[Distributions]

#include <eosim/dist/numbergeneratorfactory.hpp>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Random Number Generator Factory.

Author:
Sebastián Alaggia
Version:
1.0.1
Date:
2005
This class is a factory of random number generator classes. It returns a new generator whose type is type.


Static Public Member Functions

static NumberGenerator * make (GenType type)
 It returns a pointer to a new generator whose type is type.

Member Function Documentation

NumberGenerator * NumberGeneratorFactory::make ( GenType  type  )  [static]

It returns a pointer to a new generator whose type is type.

Note:
Every generator is identified by a GenType label. The generator returned has to be deleted by the programmer. In order to add new generators the code of this function has to be rewritten and GenType has to be updated by adding a new label for the generator.
